summary: A woman and her lover murder her husband, a doctor. Soon, however, strange things start happening, and they wonder if they really killed him, or if he is coming back from the dead to haunt them.
cast: Barbara Steele|Peter Baldwin|Elio Jotta|Harriet Medin|Carol Bennet|Carlo Kechler|Umberto Raho|Reginald Price Anderson
title: Lo spettro
